snippet: At the start of the fourth year since Syrians rose up in a peaceful movement that turned to arms, a snapshot of the country presents the harsh truth that Syria’s descent is only accelerating.
abstract: Snapshot of Syria, at start of fourth year since Syrians rose up in peaceful movement that turned to arms after violent repression, presents harsh truth that country’s descent is only accelerating, with nothing to check it; Syrian civil war has ground down cultural and political center of Middle East, turning it into stage for disaster and cruelty on nearly incomprehensible scale.
lead_paragraph: At the start of the fourth year since Syrians rose up in a peaceful movement that turned to arms, a snapshot of the country presents the harsh truth that Syria’s descent is only accelerating.
